item.title: AutoMapper 16.0.0 and MediatR 14.0.0 Released with .NET 10 Support
item.description: With the release of .NET, we've released updated packages of AutoMapper and MediatR targeting .NET 10 (and all supported versions of .NET and 4.x of .NET Framework).From this release forward, we're aligning to major release cadences of .NET since this also means upping our Link to article: https://www.jimmybogard.com/automapper-16-0-0-and-mediatr-14-0-0-released-with-net-10-support/
